24 /**
25  * @file
26  * pixel format definitions

31 
32 #define AVPALETTE_SIZE 1024
33 #define AVPALETTE_COUNT 256
34 
35 /**
36  * Pixel format.
37  *
38  * @note
39  * AV_PIX_FMT_RGB32 is handled in an endian-specific manner. An RGBA
40  * color is put together as:
41  * (A << 24) | (R << 16) | (G << 8) | B
42  * This is stored as BGRA on little-endian CPU architectures and ARGB on
43  * big-endian CPUs.
44  *
45  * @par
46  * When the pixel format is palettized RGB32 (AV_PIX_FMT_PAL8), the palettized
47  * image data is stored in AVFrame.data[0]. The palette is transported in
48  * AVFrame.data[1], is 1024 bytes long (256 4-byte entries) and is
49  * formatted the same as in AV_PIX_FMT_RGB32 described above (i.e., it is
50  * also endian-specific). Note also that the individual RGB32 palette
51  * components stored in AVFrame.data[1] should be in the range 0..255.
52  * This is important as many custom PAL8 video codecs that were designed
53  * to run on the IBM VGA graphics adapter use 6-bit palette components.
54  *
55  * @par
56  * For all the 8 bits per pixel formats, an RGB32 palette is in data[1] like
57  * for pal8. This palette is filled in automatically by the function
58  * allocating the picture.
59  */
60 enum AVPixelFormat {
61  AV_PIX_FMT_NONE = -1,
62  AV_PIX_FMT_YUV420P, ///< planar YUV 4:2:0, 12bpp, (1 Cr & Cb sample per 2x2 Y samples)
63  AV_PIX_FMT_YUYV422, ///< packed YUV 4:2:2, 16bpp, Y0 Cb Y1 Cr
64  AV_PIX_FMT_RGB24, ///< packed RGB 8:8:8, 24bpp, RGBRGB...
65  AV_PIX_FMT_BGR24, ///< packed RGB 8:8:8, 24bpp, BGRBGR...
66  AV_PIX_FMT_YUV422P, ///< planar YUV 4:2:2, 16bpp, (1 Cr & Cb sample per 2x1 Y samples)
67  AV_PIX_FMT_YUV444P, ///< planar YUV 4:4:4, 24bpp, (1 Cr & Cb sample per 1x1 Y samples)
68  AV_PIX_FMT_YUV410P, ///< planar YUV 4:1:0, 9bpp, (1 Cr & Cb sample per 4x4 Y samples)
69  AV_PIX_FMT_YUV411P, ///< planar YUV 4:1:1, 12bpp, (1 Cr & Cb sample per 4x1 Y samples)
70  AV_PIX_FMT_GRAY8, ///< Y , 8bpp
71  AV_PIX_FMT_MONOWHITE, ///< Y , 1bpp, 0 is white, 1 is black, in each byte pixels are ordered from the msb to the lsb
72  AV_PIX_FMT_MONOBLACK, ///< Y , 1bpp, 0 is black, 1 is white, in each byte pixels are ordered from the msb to the lsb
73  AV_PIX_FMT_PAL8, ///< 8 bits with AV_PIX_FMT_RGB32 palette
74  AV_PIX_FMT_YUVJ420P, ///< planar YUV 4:2:0, 12bpp, full scale (JPEG), deprecated in favor of AV_PIX_FMT_YUV420P and setting color_range
75  AV_PIX_FMT_YUVJ422P, ///< planar YUV 4:2:2, 16bpp, full scale (JPEG), deprecated in favor of AV_PIX_FMT_YUV422P and setting color_range
76  AV_PIX_FMT_YUVJ444P, ///< planar YUV 4:4:4, 24bpp, full scale (JPEG), deprecated in favor of AV_PIX_FMT_YUV444P and setting color_range
77  AV_PIX_FMT_UYVY422, ///< packed YUV 4:2:2, 16bpp, Cb Y0 Cr Y1
78  AV_PIX_FMT_UYYVYY411, ///< packed YUV 4:1:1, 12bpp, Cb Y0 Y1 Cr Y2 Y3
79  AV_PIX_FMT_BGR8, ///< packed RGB 3:3:2, 8bpp, (msb)2B 3G 3R(lsb)
80  AV_PIX_FMT_BGR4, ///< packed RGB 1:2:1 bitstream, 4bpp, (msb)1B 2G 1R(lsb), a byte contains two pixels, the first pixel in the byte is the one composed by the 4 msb bits
81  AV_PIX_FMT_BGR4_BYTE, ///< packed RGB 1:2:1, 8bpp, (msb)1B 2G 1R(lsb)
82  AV_PIX_FMT_RGB8, ///< packed RGB 3:3:2, 8bpp, (msb)2R 3G 3B(lsb)
83  AV_PIX_FMT_RGB4, ///< packed RGB 1:2:1 bitstream, 4bpp, (msb)1R 2G 1B(lsb), a byte contains two pixels, the first pixel in the byte is the one composed by the 4 msb bits
84  AV_PIX_FMT_RGB4_BYTE, ///< packed RGB 1:2:1, 8bpp, (msb)1R 2G 1B(lsb)
85  AV_PIX_FMT_NV12, ///< planar YUV 4:2:0, 12bpp, 1 plane for Y and 1 plane for the UV components, which are interleaved (first byte U and the following byte V)
86  AV_PIX_FMT_NV21, ///< as above, but U and V bytes are swapped
87 
88  AV_PIX_FMT_ARGB, ///< packed ARGB 8:8:8:8, 32bpp, ARGBARGB...
89  AV_PIX_FMT_RGBA, ///< packed RGBA 8:8:8:8, 32bpp, RGBARGBA...
90  AV_PIX_FMT_ABGR, ///< packed ABGR 8:8:8:8, 32bpp, ABGRABGR...
91  AV_PIX_FMT_BGRA, ///< packed BGRA 8:8:8:8, 32bpp, BGRABGRA...
92 
93  AV_PIX_FMT_GRAY16BE, ///< Y , 16bpp, big-endian
94  AV_PIX_FMT_GRAY16LE, ///< Y , 16bpp, little-endian
95  AV_PIX_FMT_YUV440P, ///< planar YUV 4:4:0 (1 Cr & Cb sample per 1x2 Y samples)
96  AV_PIX_FMT_YUVJ440P, ///< planar YUV 4:4:0 full scale (JPEG), deprecated in favor of AV_PIX_FMT_YUV440P and setting color_range
97  AV_PIX_FMT_YUVA420P, ///< planar YUV 4:2:0, 20bpp, (1 Cr & Cb sample per 2x2 Y & A samples)
98  AV_PIX_FMT_RGB48BE, ///< packed RGB 16:16:16, 48bpp, 16R, 16G, 16B, the 2-byte value for each R/G/B component is stored as big-endian
99  AV_PIX_FMT_RGB48LE, ///< packed RGB 16:16:16, 48bpp, 16R, 16G, 16B, the 2-byte value for each R/G/B component is stored as little-endian
100 
101  AV_PIX_FMT_RGB565BE, ///< packed RGB 5:6:5, 16bpp, (msb) 5R 6G 5B(lsb), big-endian
102  AV_PIX_FMT_RGB565LE, ///< packed RGB 5:6:5, 16bpp, (msb) 5R 6G 5B(lsb), little-endian
103  AV_PIX_FMT_RGB555BE, ///< packed RGB 5:5:5, 16bpp, (msb)1X 5R 5G 5B(lsb), big-endian , X=unused/undefined
104  AV_PIX_FMT_RGB555LE, ///< packed RGB 5:5:5, 16bpp, (msb)1X 5R 5G 5B(lsb), little-endian, X=unused/undefined
105 
106  AV_PIX_FMT_BGR565BE, ///< packed BGR 5:6:5, 16bpp, (msb) 5B 6G 5R(lsb), big-endian
107  AV_PIX_FMT_BGR565LE, ///< packed BGR 5:6:5, 16bpp, (msb) 5B 6G 5R(lsb), little-endian
108  AV_PIX_FMT_BGR555BE, ///< packed BGR 5:5:5, 16bpp, (msb)1X 5B 5G 5R(lsb), big-endian , X=unused/undefined
109  AV_PIX_FMT_BGR555LE, ///< packed BGR 5:5:5, 16bpp, (msb)1X 5B 5G 5R(lsb), little-endian, X=unused/undefined
110 
111 #if FF_API_VAAPI
112  /** @name Deprecated pixel formats */
113  /**@{*/
114  AV_PIX_FMT_VAAPI_MOCO, ///< HW acceleration through VA API at motion compensation entry-point, Picture.data[3] contains a vaapi_render_state struct which contains macroblocks as well as various fields extracted from headers
115  AV_PIX_FMT_VAAPI_IDCT, ///< HW acceleration through VA API at IDCT entry-point, Picture.data[3] contains a vaapi_render_state struct which contains fields extracted from headers
116  AV_PIX_FMT_VAAPI_VLD, ///< HW decoding through VA API, Picture.data[3] contains a VASurfaceID
117  /**@}*/
118  AV_PIX_FMT_VAAPI = AV_PIX_FMT_VAAPI_VLD,
119 #else
120  /**
121  * Hardware acceleration through VA-API, data[3] contains a
122  * VASurfaceID.
123  */
124  AV_PIX_FMT_VAAPI,
125 #endif

144  AV_PIX_FMT_BGR48BE, ///< packed RGB 16:16:16, 48bpp, 16B, 16G, 16R, the 2-byte value for each R/G/B component is stored as big-endian
145  AV_PIX_FMT_BGR48LE, ///< packed RGB 16:16:16, 48bpp, 16B, 16G, 16R, the 2-byte value for each R/G/B component is stored as little-endian

147  /**
148  * The following 12 formats have the disadvantage of needing 1 format for each bit depth.
149  * Notice that each 9/10 bits sample is stored in 16 bits with extra padding.
150  * If you want to support multiple bit depths, then using AV_PIX_FMT_YUV420P16* with the bpp stored separately is better.
151  */
152  AV_PIX_FMT_YUV420P9BE, ///< planar YUV 4:2:0, 13.5bpp, (1 Cr & Cb sample per 2x2 Y samples), big-endian
153  AV_PIX_FMT_YUV420P9LE, ///< planar YUV 4:2:0, 13.5bpp, (1 Cr & Cb sample per 2x2 Y samples), little-endian
154  AV_PIX_FMT_YUV420P10BE,///< planar YUV 4:2:0, 15bpp, (1 Cr & Cb sample per 2x2 Y samples), big-endian
155  AV_PIX_FMT_YUV420P10LE,///< planar YUV 4:2:0, 15bpp, (1 Cr & Cb sample per 2x2 Y samples), little-endian
156  AV_PIX_FMT_YUV422P10BE,///< planar YUV 4:2:2, 20bpp, (1 Cr & Cb sample per 2x1 Y samples), big-endian
157  AV_PIX_FMT_YUV422P10LE,///< planar YUV 4:2:2, 20bpp, (1 Cr & Cb sample per 2x1 Y samples), little-endian
158  AV_PIX_FMT_YUV444P9BE, ///< planar YUV 4:4:4, 27bpp, (1 Cr & Cb sample per 1x1 Y samples), big-endian
159  AV_PIX_FMT_YUV444P9LE, ///< planar YUV 4:4:4, 27bpp, (1 Cr & Cb sample per 1x1 Y samples), little-endian
160  AV_PIX_FMT_YUV444P10BE,///< planar YUV 4:4:4, 30bpp, (1 Cr & Cb sample per 1x1 Y samples), big-endian
161  AV_PIX_FMT_YUV444P10LE,///< planar YUV 4:4:4, 30bpp, (1 Cr & Cb sample per 1x1 Y samples), little-endian
162  AV_PIX_FMT_YUV422P9BE, ///< planar YUV 4:2:2, 18bpp, (1 Cr & Cb sample per 2x1 Y samples), big-endian
163  AV_PIX_FMT_YUV422P9LE, ///< planar YUV 4:2:2, 18bpp, (1 Cr & Cb sample per 2x1 Y samples), little-endian
164  AV_PIX_FMT_GBRP, ///< planar GBR 4:4:4 24bpp
165  AV_PIX_FMT_GBR24P = AV_PIX_FMT_GBRP, // alias for #AV_PIX_FMT_GBRP
166  AV_PIX_FMT_GBRP9BE, ///< planar GBR 4:4:4 27bpp, big-endian
167  AV_PIX_FMT_GBRP9LE, ///< planar GBR 4:4:4 27bpp, little-endian
168  AV_PIX_FMT_GBRP10BE, ///< planar GBR 4:4:4 30bpp, big-endian
169  AV_PIX_FMT_GBRP10LE, ///< planar GBR 4:4:4 30bpp, little-endian
170  AV_PIX_FMT_GBRP16BE, ///< planar GBR 4:4:4 48bpp, big-endian
171  AV_PIX_FMT_GBRP16LE, ///< planar GBR 4:4:4 48bpp, little-endian
172  AV_PIX_FMT_YUVA422P, ///< planar YUV 4:2:2 24bpp, (1 Cr & Cb sample per 2x1 Y & A samples)
173  AV_PIX_FMT_YUVA444P, ///< planar YUV 4:4:4 32bpp, (1 Cr & Cb sample per 1x1 Y & A samples)
174  AV_PIX_FMT_YUVA420P9BE, ///< planar YUV 4:2:0 22.5bpp, (1 Cr & Cb sample per 2x2 Y & A samples), big-endian
175  AV_PIX_FMT_YUVA420P9LE, ///< planar YUV 4:2:0 22.5bpp, (1 Cr & Cb sample per 2x2 Y & A samples), little-endian

178  AV_PIX_FMT_YUVA444P9BE, ///< planar YUV 4:4:4 36bpp, (1 Cr & Cb sample per 1x1 Y & A samples), big-endian
179  AV_PIX_FMT_YUVA444P9LE, ///< planar YUV 4:4:4 36bpp, (1 Cr & Cb sample per 1x1 Y & A samples), little-endian
180  AV_PIX_FMT_YUVA420P10BE, ///< planar YUV 4:2:0 25bpp, (1 Cr & Cb sample per 2x2 Y & A samples, big-endian)

416 /**
417  * Chromaticity coordinates of the source primaries.
418  * These values match the ones defined by ISO/IEC 23001-8_2013 7.1.
419  */
420 enum AVColorPrimaries {
421  AVCOL_PRI_RESERVED0 = 0,
422  AVCOL_PRI_BT709 = 1, ///< also ITU-R BT1361 / IEC 61966-2-4 / SMPTE RP177 Annex B
423  AVCOL_PRI_UNSPECIFIED = 2,
424  AVCOL_PRI_RESERVED = 3,
425  AVCOL_PRI_BT470M = 4, ///< also FCC Title 47 Code of Federal Regulations 73.682 (a)(20)
426 
427  AVCOL_PRI_BT470BG = 5, ///< also ITU-R BT601-6 625 / ITU-R BT1358 625 / ITU-R BT1700 625 PAL & SECAM
428  AVCOL_PRI_SMPTE170M = 6, ///< also ITU-R BT601-6 525 / ITU-R BT1358 525 / ITU-R BT1700 NTSC
429  AVCOL_PRI_SMPTE240M = 7, ///< functionally identical to above
430  AVCOL_PRI_FILM = 8, ///< colour filters using Illuminant C
431  AVCOL_PRI_BT2020 = 9, ///< ITU-R BT2020
432  AVCOL_PRI_SMPTE428 = 10, ///< SMPTE ST 428-1 (CIE 1931 XYZ)
433  AVCOL_PRI_SMPTEST428_1 = AVCOL_PRI_SMPTE428,
434  AVCOL_PRI_SMPTE431 = 11, ///< SMPTE ST 431-2 (2011) / DCI P3
435  AVCOL_PRI_SMPTE432 = 12, ///< SMPTE ST 432-1 (2010) / P3 D65 / Display P3
436  AVCOL_PRI_JEDEC_P22 = 22, ///< JEDEC P22 phosphors
437  AVCOL_PRI_NB ///< Not part of ABI
438 };

440 /**
441  * Color Transfer Characteristic.
442  * These values match the ones defined by ISO/IEC 23001-8_2013 7.2.
443  */
444 enum AVColorTransferCharacteristic {
445  AVCOL_TRC_RESERVED0 = 0,
446  AVCOL_TRC_BT709 = 1, ///< also ITU-R BT1361
447  AVCOL_TRC_UNSPECIFIED = 2,
448  AVCOL_TRC_RESERVED = 3,
449  AVCOL_TRC_GAMMA22 = 4, ///< also ITU-R BT470M / ITU-R BT1700 625 PAL & SECAM
450  AVCOL_TRC_GAMMA28 = 5, ///< also ITU-R BT470BG
451  AVCOL_TRC_SMPTE170M = 6, ///< also ITU-R BT601-6 525 or 625 / ITU-R BT1358 525 or 625 / ITU-R BT1700 NTSC
452  AVCOL_TRC_SMPTE240M = 7,
453  AVCOL_TRC_LINEAR = 8, ///< "Linear transfer characteristics"
454  AVCOL_TRC_LOG = 9, ///< "Logarithmic transfer characteristic (100:1 range)"
455  AVCOL_TRC_LOG_SQRT = 10, ///< "Logarithmic transfer characteristic (100 * Sqrt(10) : 1 range)"
456  AVCOL_TRC_IEC61966_2_4 = 11, ///< IEC 61966-2-4
457  AVCOL_TRC_BT1361_ECG = 12, ///< ITU-R BT1361 Extended Colour Gamut
458  AVCOL_TRC_IEC61966_2_1 = 13, ///< IEC 61966-2-1 (sRGB or sYCC)
459  AVCOL_TRC_BT2020_10 = 14, ///< ITU-R BT2020 for 10-bit system
460  AVCOL_TRC_BT2020_12 = 15, ///< ITU-R BT2020 for 12-bit system
461  AVCOL_TRC_SMPTE2084 = 16, ///< SMPTE ST 2084 for 10-, 12-, 14- and 16-bit systems
462  AVCOL_TRC_SMPTEST2084 = AVCOL_TRC_SMPTE2084,
463  AVCOL_TRC_SMPTE428 = 17, ///< SMPTE ST 428-1
464  AVCOL_TRC_SMPTEST428_1 = AVCOL_TRC_SMPTE428,
465  AVCOL_TRC_ARIB_STD_B67 = 18, ///< ARIB STD-B67, known as "Hybrid log-gamma"
466  AVCOL_TRC_NB ///< Not part of ABI
467 };

473 enum AVColorSpace {
474  AVCOL_SPC_RGB = 0, ///< order of coefficients is actually GBR, also IEC 61966-2-1 (sRGB)
475  AVCOL_SPC_BT709 = 1, ///< also ITU-R BT1361 / IEC 61966-2-4 xvYCC709 / SMPTE RP177 Annex B
476  AVCOL_SPC_UNSPECIFIED = 2,

478  AVCOL_SPC_FCC = 4, ///< FCC Title 47 Code of Federal Regulations 73.682 (a)(20)
479  AVCOL_SPC_BT470BG = 5, ///< also ITU-R BT601-6 625 / ITU-R BT1358 625 / ITU-R BT1700 625 PAL & SECAM / IEC 61966-2-4 xvYCC601
480  AVCOL_SPC_SMPTE170M = 6, ///< also ITU-R BT601-6 525 / ITU-R BT1358 525 / ITU-R BT1700 NTSC
481  AVCOL_SPC_SMPTE240M = 7, ///< functionally identical to above
482  AVCOL_SPC_YCGCO = 8, ///< Used by Dirac / VC-2 and H.264 FRext, see ITU-T SG16
483  AVCOL_SPC_YCOCG = AVCOL_SPC_YCGCO,
484  AVCOL_SPC_BT2020_NCL = 9, ///< ITU-R BT2020 non-constant luminance system
485  AVCOL_SPC_BT2020_CL = 10, ///< ITU-R BT2020 constant luminance system

487  AVCOL_SPC_CHROMA_DERIVED_NCL = 12, ///< Chromaticity-derived non-constant luminance system
488  AVCOL_SPC_CHROMA_DERIVED_CL = 13, ///< Chromaticity-derived constant luminance system
489  AVCOL_SPC_ICTCP = 14, ///< ITU-R BT.2100-0, ICtCp
490  AVCOL_SPC_NB ///< Not part of ABI
491 };

493 /**
494  * MPEG vs JPEG YUV range.
495  */
496 enum AVColorRange {
497  AVCOL_RANGE_UNSPECIFIED = 0,
498  AVCOL_RANGE_MPEG = 1, ///< the normal 219*2^(n-8) "MPEG" YUV ranges
499  AVCOL_RANGE_JPEG = 2, ///< the normal 2^n-1 "JPEG" YUV ranges
500  AVCOL_RANGE_NB ///< Not part of ABI
501 };

503 /**
504  * Location of chroma samples.
505  *
506  * Illustration showing the location of the first (top left) chroma sample of the
507  * image, the left shows only luma, the right
508  * shows the location of the chroma sample, the 2 could be imagined to overlay
509  * each other but are drawn separately due to limitations of ASCII
510  *
511  * 1st 2nd 1st 2nd horizontal luma sample positions
512  * v v v v
513  * ______ ______
514  *1st luma line > |X X ... |3 4 X ... X are luma samples,
515  * | |1 2 1-6 are possible chroma positions
516  *2nd luma line > |X X ... |5 6 X ... 0 is undefined/unknown position
517  */
518 enum AVChromaLocation {
519  AVCHROMA_LOC_UNSPECIFIED = 0,
520  AVCHROMA_LOC_LEFT = 1, ///< MPEG-2/4 4:2:0, H.264 default for 4:2:0
521  AVCHROMA_LOC_CENTER = 2, ///< MPEG-1 4:2:0, JPEG 4:2:0, H.263 4:2:0
522  AVCHROMA_LOC_TOPLEFT = 3, ///< ITU-R 601, SMPTE 274M 296M S314M(DV 4:1:1), mpeg2 4:2:2
523  AVCHROMA_LOC_TOP = 4,
524  AVCHROMA_LOC_BOTTOMLEFT = 5,
525  AVCHROMA_LOC_BOTTOM = 6,
526  AVCHROMA_LOC_NB ///< Not part of ABI
527 };
